column1: Endless Stair was the winding stairway that led from the deepest halls of Moria up to Durins Tower on the peak of Celebdil.  It was extremely long

In the late Third Age it was presumed to have been lost or destroyed and even some Dwarves thought that it was legendary. Gandalf the wizard proved it not so when he pursued Durins Bane up it to the peak.
